import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; const SingleProduct = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [product, setProduct] = useState(null); const [images, setImages] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchProduct = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/products/${id}`); setProduct(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching product:', error); } }; const fetchImages = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/products/${id}/images`); setImages(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching images:', error); } }; fetchProduct(); fetchImages(); }, [id]); if (!product) { return
Loading...
; } return (
